sentences.en: "She thinks you're a spy," Scott said matter-of-factly.
sentences.cn: “她认为你是一名间谍，”斯科特面无表情地说。

sentences.en: "I'm averaging about five books a week," Gates says matter-of-factly.
sentences.cn: “我每周平均读5本书。”盖茨实事求是地说。

sentences.en: ‘I’m in love with you’, she’d told him matter-of-factly, ‘and it’s beginning to hurt.’
sentences.cn: “我爱上你了”，她平淡地对他说，“心开始痛了。”
